Statement Text: Tom Super … any detection of bird flu in poultry is a concern and the industry remains on high alert, the U.S. has the most robust monitoring and surveillance program …
The governmental department added that avian influenza does not present an immediate public health concern as a human case of these avian flu viruses has yet to be detected in the U.S.
A "highly pathogenic" form of bird flu was detected in a backyard flock of chickens in Suffolk County, New York, according to the U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA).
